title: Moe's Southwest Grill
typeOfFood: Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Mexican, Southwestern American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Nationwide franchise offering tacos, burritos, nachos, and rice bowls with choice of black or pinto beans, and organic tofu or veggies instead of meat. Dairy is used, so vegans need to specify. Food is made in front of you as you walk along a line. Fresh salsa bar.
